org.dotplot.tokenizer
Class FileTokenizer

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.tokenizer.FileTokenizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITokenStream
public class FileTokenizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITokenStream

Compiles a tokenstream from the entire of a file.

getActualScanner

public IScanner getActualScanner()
returns the current scanner. If null returns the current file hasn't been assigned a Scanner yet.
